item.title: Release of Crackhead Adventures v1.0.0
item.description: Today we released Crackhead Adventures verion 1.0.0! We had great fun developing the game so far. We plan on improving on the current state of the project and listening to the feedback from our community. So, what changed? We added a timer for players to compare their speed We fixed a major bug that allowed the player to walk into walls Our plans for now Adding a setting menu with volume sliders Adding additional stats at the end of the playthrough Changing the effect of the fun dust Fixing bugs Begin working on the new game!

item.title: Crackhead Adventures
item.description: Crackhead Adventures: Give me your fun dust or I will f*cking murder you (WGJ Edition) by BigNtertainment CONTENT WARNING! The game contains mature content, such as narcotics. TRIGGER WARNING! The game contains flashing images that might trigger epileptic seizures. Controls: WASD - movement Mouse - aiming and shooting E - snort cocaine (be faster, heal a bit) R - take the f u n d u s t (be a hella faster, but leaves you with almost no health) T - craft f u n d u s t from 3 bags of cocaine You are a drug-hungry crackhead fighting against the mafia to obtain the ultimate drug - the f u n n i e s t d u s t.
